data.text: @MikeRoyden @TheAthenaeum1 @Liverpool1207 How about that, such a kind gesture👍

@Waite99D @TheAthenaeum1 @Liverpool1207 Yep, me too.😁The first time I went was a special invite after I did the Blind School book in 1991. The librarian had received a copy, and gave me a call. When I arrived he had laid out a stack of maps, plans and docs relevant to the history of the school. Spent hours in there.

@MikeRoyden @TheAthenaeum1 @Liverpool1207 Aha, I remember this one👍 I've never actually been to the Athenaeum before, my only worry would be that they've have to escort me out of the library at closing (sad I know) there's just so much to see & do there 😉
@Waite99D @TheAthenaeum1 @Liverpool1207 Here's one inside - some grey haired old biff telling Kim Cattrall about her Liverpool ancestors for Who Do You Think You Are? (BBC) https://t.co/R1yndpnOGt

@vrsimility @TheAthenaeum1 @Liverpool1207 @MikeRoyden Nice simulation, even got the Dispensary in there too. 
So you could read about what was wrong with you in the Athenaeum then collect your medicine next-door-but-one 😀

@Waite99D @TheAthenaeum1 @Liverpool1207 @MikeRoyden Did a preliminary build of this and the Dispensary a while back -- would be fun to try doing the interior as well. Didn't realise plans available -- will update blog later https://t.co/EL5izeVUBN #opensim
